summary: Uses FemFeet by Phygit to improve wedding sandals
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: THIS MOD IS NOW OBSOLETE AS Phygit HAS MADE HIS OWN VERSION & HAS INCLUDED IT IN HIS OWN MOD.
FemFeet by Phygit - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666
NOTE 2: A BETTER MADE VERION CAN BE FOUND IN Calientes Body Feet HEAD and Hands --CBBE-- http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

No girl should go to their wedding with ugly feet!

---DESCRIPTION---
This mod uses the female feet mesh from FemFeet by Phygit & replaces the ugly feet mesh for the wedding sandals.


---REQUIREMENTS---
FemFeet by Phygit
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666


---INSTALL---
Use mod manger or place contents into Data directory.


---UNISTALL---
Remove files from Data directory.


---CREDIT---
All credit goes to Phygit for his FemFeet mod.


---RECOMMENDATIONS---
Recomend using this mod with mine & Phygit mod.

CBBE- with Female feet Textures by aknot 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3685


---GLITCH---
Sandals slightly clip with feet. Can not fix as i dont know how to edit skyrim meshes with Blender.
author: Savage Hammer
